fields.headline: Somewhere for later
fields.bodyText: Europe Gran Canaria: TV Travelshop (08708 404747, www.tvtravelshop.com) is offering a seven-night break to Club Paradiso from £432pp and including two free kids' places (2 to16 years), saving up to 25% per person. Self-catering accommodation fro travel between July and September. Greece: The Last Stop Holiday Shop is offering 14 nights' self-cateriung in Corfu for £175. The price includes flights and transfers, leaving Gatwick on May 6. UK: Try a traditional British seaside holiday with Norfolk Country Cottages (01603 871872). Just 50 yards from the beach in Cromer is Cloud Cuckoo Cottage, a former three-storey fisherman's cottage. A week's stay costs from £204 or £145 for a three night stay. Various dates. Jersey: Seymour Hotels (01534 724231, www.mertonhotel.com) is offering four-night family breaks this Easter from £252 per person, with a free place for a child. The offer includes B&B at the three-star Merton Hotel and Aquedome. The price includes return fast-ferry crossing from Weymouth, transfers to and from the hotel and Easter activities and entertainments. Caribbean Take the family to Grenada for Easter with Tropical Places (0800 0836662), which is offering seven nights for £1,299 from April 7. Price includes accommodation at the three-star Rex Grenadian, which offers complimentary tennis, water sports and a supervised children's club for four- to 12-year-olds. The price includes return flights from Gatwick and transfers. Middle East Dubai: Trailfinders (020 79383939) is offering a seven-night package to Dubai for £578pp based on a twin/double share at Le Royal Meridien Beach Resort. The price includes flights and transfers for midweek flights between May 15 and September 27. Bookings must be made by March 31. North America Mexico: From £769 for 14 nights all-inclusive, accommodation allocated on arrival, based on two sharing. Departs Manchester May 22. Last Stop Holiday Shop (0870 0556313, www.laststop.co.uk). South America Peru: Eight-day trip with Destination South America (01285 885333) for £1,600pp until the end of May. Takes in the treasures of the Urubamba Valley, Cusco, Pisac, Ollantaytambo, Lima, Michu Picchu. Price includes international and domestic flights, accommodation, some meals and transport. Asia Tradewinds (0870 7510004) is offering a week in Sri Lanka from £399pp, departing Heathrow between April 16 and June 30 and including seven nights' half-board in Beruwela. Fourteen nights cost £499pp.
